se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.api.helpers

Class QueryOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.api.helpers.QueryOperations

  • public final class QueryOperations
extends Object
    Utility methods to simplify JPA Query usage and increase its usability.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Detail

      • findByPrimaryKey

        public static <T extends NazgulEntity> T findByPrimaryKey(Class<T> entityType,
                                                          javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager,
                                                          Object primaryKey)
                                                   throws PersistenceOperationException
        Acquires a T-type Entity using the provided primary key.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Entity expected.
        Parameters:
        entityType - The type of Entity expected.
        entityManager - The active EntityManager.
        primaryKey - The primary key used to acquire the Entity.
        Returns:
        The Entity of type T with the provided primaryKey.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if a JPA-related exception occurred while performing the operation.

      • fireNamedQuery

        public static <T extends NazgulEntity> List<T> fireNamedQuery(String query,
                                                              javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager,
                                                              Object... parameters)
                                                       throws PersistenceOperationException
        Fires a JPA NamedQuery, returning the results as a List.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Entity expected.
        Parameters:
        query - The name of the JPA NamedQuery to fire.
        entityManager - The active EntityManager.
        parameters - The parameters for the NamedQuery.
        Returns:
        The List of resulting Entities.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if a JPA-related exception occurred while performing the operation.

      • fireNamedQuery

        public static <T extends NazgulEntity> List<T> fireNamedQuery(String query,
                                                              javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager,
                                                              Map<String,Object> parameters)
                                                       throws PersistenceOperationException
        Fires a JPA NamedQuery, returning the results as a List.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Entity expected.
        Parameters:
        query - The name of the JPA NamedQuery to fire.
        entityManager - The active EntityManager. Cannot be null.
        parameters - The parameters for the NamedQuery, assuming that the named query contains named parameters matching the key values within the supplied parameters Map.
        Returns:
        The List of resulting Entities.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if a JPA-related exception occurred while performing the operation.

      • fireNamedQueryWithResultLimit

        public static <T extends NazgulEntity> List<T> fireNamedQueryWithResultLimit(String query,
                                                                             javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager,
                                                                             int maxResults,
                                                                             Object... parameters)
                                                                      throws PersistenceOperationException
        Fires a JPA NamedQuery, returning the maximum given results as a List.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Entity expected.
        Parameters:
        query - The name of the JPA NamedQuery to fire.
        entityManager - The active EntityManager. Cannot be null.
        parameters - The parameters for the NamedQuery.
        maxResults - The maximum number of results returned. Must not be a negative number.
        Returns:
        The List of resulting Entities.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if a JPA-related exception occurred while performing the operation.

      • fireNamedQuery

        public static <T extends NazgulEntity> List<T> fireNamedQuery(String query,
                                                              javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager,
                                                              int maxResults,
                                                              Map<String,Object> parameters)
                                                       throws PersistenceOperationException
        Fires a JPA NamedQuery, returning the maximum given results as a List.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Entity expected.
        Parameters:
        query - The name of the JPA NamedQuery to fire.
        entityManager - The active EntityManager. Cannot be null.
        parameters - The parameters for the NamedQuery, assuming that the named query contains named parameters matching the key values within the supplied parameters Map.
        maxResults - The maximum number of results returned. Must not be a negative number.
        Returns:
        The List of resulting Entities.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if a JPA-related exception occurred while performing the operation.

      • setParameters

        public static void setParameters(javax.persistence.Query query,
                                 Object... params)
        Assigns the supplied indexed JPQL parameters to the supplied query.
        Parameters:
        query - The Query whose indexed parameters should be set.
        params - The parameters to set.
